LanguageData.RF_Gun_XMeight.label: HK XM8 군용 소총
LanguageData.RF_Gun_XMeight.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Three-점사. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_FAMAS.label: 파마스 G2
LanguageData.Gun_FAMAS.description: The 파마스 is a bullpup-styled assault 소총 designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-Étienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service 소총 of the French military. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.
LanguageData.Gun_AK47Gun.label: AK-47
LanguageData.Gun_AK47Gun.description: The AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62×39mm assault 소총, first developed in the 소련제 Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is officially known as Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова). Good damage, average range and rate of fire, poor accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_MarineSturmRifle.label: 타볼 TAR-21
LanguageData.Gun_MarineSturmRifle.description: The Marine sturm 소총 is the standard firearm for all combat personnel in the Colonial Marine Corps.
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalCombatRifle.label: MA5 ICWS
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalCombatRifle.description: The MA5 Individual Combat Weapon 시스템 (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault 소총) is a standard-issue service 소총 of the UNSC Marines.
LanguageData.Gun_SG553Gun.label: SIG SG553
LanguageData.Gun_SG553Gun.description: The SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel 소총) version of the SIG SG550. It fires the 5.56x45mm NATO round. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.
LanguageData.Gun_AUG.label: 슈타이어 AUG A3
LanguageData.Gun_AUG.description: The 슈타이어 AUG is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault 소총, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_SCAR_H.label: FN SCAR-H
LanguageData.Gun_SCAR_H.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault 소총 (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading 소총 with a rotating bolt. The 소총 was developed by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. Good damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.
